data.eml:eml: Five species of the family Cyproideidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Japan, with the description of a new genus and two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ariyama, Hiroyuki (2016): Five species of the family Cyproideidae (Crustacea: Amphipoda) from Japan, with the description of a new genus and two new species. Zootaxa 4097 (3): 301-331, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4097.3.1
